name: Michael Reeve
description: Michael Reeve is a current junior at The University of Maryland studying Computer Science
about: I am a junior Computer Science student at the University of Maryland and a former software engineer intern at Teradyne. My skills include CI/CD workflows and backend development. I am constantly seeking opportunities to expand my knowledge and grow my skill set in the field.

experience.title: Computer Science Ambassador
description: Supported events catered toward prospective Computer Science students
Coordinated with teammates to host panel discussions with 150+ attendees
Hosted 1 on 1 advising sessions with current students to assist with their course selections

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Added debugging capabilities to a Visual Basic interpreter in C#

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Implemented a CI/CD pipeline for a team of over 20 members
Improved our team's build times by 250% by implementing an automatic workflow that only recompiled necessary files
Leveraged the use of webhooks, allowing the pipeline to automatically start a build when a team member made a commit to the codebase
Developed using Jenkins and Docker images as agents, with support for Gitea
